panels.description: The rate of errors encountered on request round trip.
panels.title: Round Trip Errors Rate

panels.description: The latency of successful CONNECT requests.
panels.title: CONNECT Latency - 2XX Requests

panels.description: The rate of successful CONNECT requests.

panels.description: The latency of successful HTTP requests. CONNECT requests not included.
panels.title: RoundTrip Latency - 2XX Requests

panels.title: 2XX Requests Rate

panels.description: Non-2XX HTTP requests rate. CONNECT requests not included.
panels.title: Non-2XX Requests Rate

panels.description: Number of bytes allocated on the stack.
panels.title: Stack

panels.description: Number of bytes allocated on the heap.
panels.title: Heap

panels.description: Number of bytes obtained from system.
panels.title: System

panels.description: Pause duration caused by go garbage collection.
panels.title: GC Duration

list.description:
It must match Forwarder's `--prom-namespace` flag value.
Default: `forwarder`.
list.name: prom_namespace

list.description:
Use it to provide custom labels and filter Forwarder data.
Example: `job="forwarder", namespace="my-namespace"`.
list.name: labels
